thought: The website is live and accessible. Next, I should examine the content of the website for any of the scam characteristics listed.
observation: Precise Castings Ltd. | Investment Casting Company | Ontario  Skip to content 519-669-5159 Menu Home Quick Inquiry Request For Quote Quotation Guideline Quick Facts – Our Process Other Process Options Alloys Poured Common Casting Alloys Specifications & Standards Design Data Q&A Questions About Investment Castings Drawings & Blueprints Tooling Design Considerations Purchase Order The Importance of Sample Castings Wax Pattern Production The Ceramic Shell Mold Process Ceramic Shell Preparation For Pouring Melting & Pouring Process Casting Process – Cleaning ISO Certification Toxic Substance Reduction Plans (TSRP) AODA – Accessibility for Ontarians with Disabilities Act Industries Contact Us Investing in our future…proud of our past. Innovation Through Investment Castings Tooling, Design & Build Casting The Shell Wax Pattern, Injection & Assembly Shell Removal & Cutoff Ceramic Shelling Process Completing The Process Precise Castings Ltd. – where investment casting is “precision casting”! An industry leading commercial precision investment casting (lost wax) foundry producing steel, stainless steel and nickel alloy castings. Let the team at Precise Castings Inc. prove their value in the successful launch of your next critical project. Specializing in the lost wax precision casting process, investment casting has some rather distinct and unique advantages over other more cumbersome and expensive casting processes: Uninhibited flexibility and freedom of design Supports and suited for conversion from processes i.e.: Sand Casting, Forging, Machining, Fabrications Alloy choices matching your specific job requirements From low alloy investment castings to stainless steel or nickel alloy investment castings, we keep you ahead of the competition. Our attention to detail using precision casting techniques produces the highest quality steel castings for various industries. Our alloy steel castings are integral to industries such as transportation, military, forestry, firearms, art, recreation, construction, oil and gas, pump and valve and other commercial applications. We also service higher demand applications such as refining or processing applications that require high temperature and wear-resistant nickel or severe application situations using cobalt castings as an example. The food and medical industry are always innovating new products that call for our stainless steel castings. Duplex stainless and precipitation hardening alloys such as 17/4 are a very common casting at our precision casting operation. Every customer requirements are carefully scrutinized in contract review and confirmed so you are confident your investment castings are ideally suited to your needs before proceeding. It has to be right for you! Our quality services include: Industry leading delivery and “customer-ized” service Production from a ounces to approximately 150 pounds Look to Precise Castings for your next casting need! Precise Castings Ltd. is the #1 Investment casting company in our region. Stainless Steel Casting • Cobalt Casting • High Alloy Casting • Low Alloy Casting Get a Quote Online Registered as operating a Quality Management System with the BSI Group Locations Served Quick Links Alloys History When Should I Contact An Investment Caster? Specifications Samples Tooling FAQ Our Process Blueprints AODA Address:

However, I should verify the legitimacy of the business and look into the contact details provided.

The presence on these platforms and the nature of the content suggest a legitimate business rather than a scam operation. observation.reason: The WHOIS data indicates the domain is registered to a legitimate company with a long-standing history (since 2001). The website's content is professional and related to investment casting services with no signs of common scam characteristics. There are also legitimate business listings and employee reviews found through search results and no significant negative social media attention.
